name: Buddy (itch) (Jiaqu Wu)
description:
Goal: Trapped on the ice, you and Buddy need to leave together in a boat

Use the '↑', '↓', '←' and '→' buttons to control your character's rotation and movement

When the character is facing Buddy, you can pick him up by pressing "Space"

The character can't get Buddy without facing him

You can always use Space to place him on the ice or the boat in front of you (if it doesn't break completely)

Note that when you walk on the ice with Buddy, the ice will break up a bit and if you walk on this ice with him again, you and Buddy will fall and drown!

Luckily, you can use the Z button to undo your actions at any time

Whether Buddy is put in by you or you walk in with Buddy in your arms, as long as all Buddy in the level are on the boat with you, you can leave together!

游戏目标: 被困在冰面,你和Buddy需要乘船一起离开这里

使用"↑", "↓", "←", "→"四个按键控制角色转向和移动

当你面对Buddy时,可以按空格抱起它,不面朝Buddy是拿不到它的

当然，你总是可以按空格将它放在你面前的冰面上（前提是它不会完全断裂）

注意，当你抱着Buddy走过冰面时，冰面会破裂一些，如果你抱着他走在破裂的冰上，你和Buddy都会掉下去淹死！

你可以在任何时候使用Z键来撤销你的行动

无论Buddy 是由你放进去的，还是你抱着Buddy 走进去的，只要这一关中所有的Buddy都和你一起上了船，你们就可以离开啦!
